title: Best of The Program | 7/6/21
description:
Walmarts and Targets in San Francisco are shutting down after a spike in shoplifting. Stu and Pat discuss all the people challenging Gov. Abbott and their chances, including unannounced candidate Matthew McConaughey. ESPN is yet again facing controversy after it recently went woke. The Left continues to eat its own.
